name: Spreading the Cold
description:
It is suggested not to play this game in Google Chrome.

You're Mitos, elite cold germ.
You're entered the enemy territory, and now you can effectively freeze the kid's cold body.

- WASD/Arrows to move
- Left click to toggle weapon
- Escape to pause

A game by Exploding Beakers: Blawnode (me), Jesse4060 and Magmaconpro.
